author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5072: Shutdown thread pool more eagerly in scheduled poll consumers. Also shutdown services when stopping producer/consumer templates as the intent is not to use them anymore.

author: psharples
msg: Updated references to set the request header to "accepts" into "Accept".  'accepts' does not work on tomcat 6.0.32 and the tests fail
